img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(4\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/32/Five_Skandhas_%284%29.png)
Continue along the cliff's edge, where you'll see a statue above another cave entrance. Go inside here and up the stairs on the opposite side, where you'll see the monkey you saw near the first Skandha.
img_below_text:
Once it's run away again, go up the stairs and get the Skandha of Thought from the head it was stood near.
## How to Find the Skandha of Choice

img_summary: The image depicts a richly adorned monkey character standing near a large, weathered statue head and skeletal remains in a snowy, rocky environment. This scene is part of a guide for locating the "Skandha of Thought" in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The preceding text describes the journey through a cliffside cave to reach this area, while the following text suggests interacting with the statue head to obtain the Skandha of Thought after the monkey character moves away. The image visually highlights the narrative progression and serves as a reference point for players navigating this section of the game.
